lyrics:
ये शाम मस्तानी मदहोश किए जाए
मुझे डोर कोई खींचे, तेरी ओर लिए जाए
ये शाम मस्तानी मदहोश किए जाए
मुझे डोर कोई खींचे, तेरी ओर लिए जाए

दूर रहती है तू, मेरे पास आती नहीं
होंठों पे तेरे कभी प्यास आती नहीं
ऐसा लगे जैसे कि तू हँस के ज़हर कोई पिए जाए

ये शाम मस्तानी मदहोश किए जाए
मुझे डोर कोई खींचे, तेरी ओर लिए जाए

बात जब मैं करूँ मुझे रोक देती है क्यूँ?
तेरी मीठी नज़र मुझे टोक देती है क्यूँ?
तेरी हया, तेरी शरम, तेरी क़सम मेरे होंठ सिए जाए

ये शाम मस्तानी मदहोश किए जाए
मुझे डोर कोई खींचे, तेरी ओर लिए जाए

एक रूठी हुई तक़दीर जैसे कोई
ख़ामोश ऐसे है तू तस्वीर जैसे कोई
तेरी नज़र बनके ज़ुबाँ, लेकिन तेरे पैग़ाम दिए जाए

ये शाम मस्तानी मदहोश किए जाए
मुझे डोर कोई खींचे, तेरी ओर लिए जाए
ये शाम मस्तानी मदहोश किए जाए
मुझे डोर कोई खींचे, तेरी ओर लिए जाए
translation:
Let this evening be intoxicated
someone pulls me towards you
Let this evening be intoxicated
someone pulls me towards you

You stay far away, don't come near me
you never feel thirsty on your lips
It seems as if you are drinking poison by laughing.

Let this evening be intoxicated
someone pulls me towards you

Why does it stop me when I talk?
Why does your sweet glance disturb me?
Your shame, your shame, I swear on you, my lips should be stitched

Let this evening be intoxicated
someone pulls me towards you

a sullen fate like someone
you are silent like a picture
Your eyes become your tongue, but your message should be given

Let this evening be intoxicated
someone pulls me towards you
Let this evening be intoxicated
someone pulls me towards you

lyrics:

lyrics:
Making my way downtown
Walking fast, faces pass and I'm homebound

Staring blankly ahead
Just making my way
Making a way through the crowd

And I need you
And I miss you
And now I wonder

If I could fall into the sky
Do you think time would pass me by?
'Cause you know I'd walk a thousand miles
If I could just see you tonight

It's always times like these when I think of you
And wonder if you ever think of me
'Cause everything's so wrong, and I don't belong
Living in your precious memory

'Cause I need you
And I miss you
And now I wonder

If I could fall into the sky
Do you think time would pass me by?
Oh, 'cause you know I'd walk a thousand miles
If I could just see you tonight

And I, I don't wanna let you know
I, I drown in your memory
I, I don't wanna let this go
I, I don't
